DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety tolerability increase dose level PF-06263507 patient advance solid tumor order determine maximum tolerate dose select recommend Phase 2 dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-06263507 In Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis solid tumor advanced/metastatic resistant standard therapy standard therapy available . Performance Status 0 1 . Adequate bone marrow , kidney , liver , heart function . Brain metastases require steroid . Major surgery anticancer therapy within 4 week study treatment start . Active bacterial , fungal viral infection .
